topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.0: Enable Name Resolution from Tenant VMs in the Overcloud

body.p: This page provides instructions for setting a default DNS name server for your HPE Helion OpenStack cloud. These steps need to be performed prior to installation.

Note: After the installation, you can specify DNS servers on a per-subnet basis using the neutron subnet-create --dns-nameserver command. Refer to the OpenStack documentation, such as Advanced Networking operations.

section.title: Enabling name resolution
section.p: To enable name resolution from tenant VMs in the overcloud, it is necessary to configure the DNS servers that will be used by dnsmasq as forwarders.

li.p: Log in to your install system as root:
Add the desired dnsmasq_dns_servers items by modifying the value field with the IP address of your DNS server. Multiple DNS servers can be specified as a comma separated list.
